member.name: D2D1_EMBOSS_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Emboss effect.

member.name: D2D1_EMBOSS_PROP.D2D1_EMBOSS_PROP_HEIGHT
member.summary: The D2D1_EMBOSS_PROP_HEIGHT property is a float value controlling the strength of the embossing effect. The allowed range is 0.0 to 10.0. The default value is 1.0.

member.name: D2D1_EMBOSS_PROP.D2D1_EMBOSS_PROP_DIRECTION
member.summary: The D2D1_EMBOSS_PROP_DIRECTION property is a float value specifying the light direction used to create the effect. The allowed range is 0.0 to 360.0. The default value is 0.0.
